      • feedPaperStart

        public void feedPaperStart(int direction,
                  int mode,
                  int step)
        To feed the paper.
        Parameters:
        direction - feed out the paper if direction = 0, feed in the paper if direction != 0.
        mode - stop feed out the paper when there is no paper remaining if mode = 0, don't stop feed out the paper when there is no paper remaining if mode != 0.
        step - feed the paper.

      • feedPaperStop

        public void feedPaperStop()
        To stop the feed operation Printer#feedPaperStart(int).
